title: Netflix Adds 2.4 Million Subscribers, Reversing a Decline
description: Netflix, which has about 223 million subscribers worldwide, will soon introduce a lower-priced service with ads in a bid to attract more customers.
dc:creator: Benjamin Mullin
media:description: “After a challenging first half, we believe we’re on a path to re-accelerate growth,” Netflix said in its quarterly letter to shareholders. “The key is pleasing members.”
